readable.title: 374103966_2987706be1
readable.content: A large man at a party , with a drink in his right hand . A large man in white dances in the middle of a crowd holding a beverage in his hand . A robust man with his mouth open in a white shirt and glasses holding a drink near other people . Bearded overweight man carrying drink and yawning . Overweight man with beard in white shirt holding a drink at a bar , dancing .
